abstract: Domain adaptation improved the performance of large language models in predicting Deauville scores in PET/CT reports.Keywords Lymphoma, PET, PET/CT, Transfer Learning, Unsupervised Learning, Convolutional Neural Network (CNN), Nuclear Medicine, Deauville, Natural Language Processing, Multimodal Learning, Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Language Modeling Supplemental material is available for this article. © RSNA, 2023See also the commentary by Abajian in this issue.
